rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;ad79be25.1503">   <title>{course] Matlab course just before Easter meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;ad79be25.1503</link>   <description> Hello All<br><br>Those that are thinking of coming to the Nottingham Meeting might be<br>interested to know that there are still a few places left on the matlab<br>course running immediately beforehand.<br><br>The University of Nottingham is running a pair of complementary<br>residential workshops teaching beginner-level programming for use<br>in psychology and neuroscience.<br><br>- *Matlab for Psychology and Neuroscience* - workshop<br>http://www.psychology.nottingham.ac.uk/matlab [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T18:43:44+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Harriet Allen</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;ad79be25.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2aa684fa.1503">   <title>AVA [Meeting] AGM Abstract extension </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2aa684fa.1503</link>   <description> Dear All<br><br>Abstracts are flowing in, but after requests, the abstract deadline for<br>the AVA AGM will be extended to Thursday March 19th (midnight UK time).<br><br>This year\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds invited talks will be<br><br>Jan Atkinson<br>Visual Development Unit, UCL<br>Talk title: &quot;The Developing Visual Brain - from Newborns to Numeracy&quot;<br><br>Mark Georgeson<br>Centre for Research in Vision and Hearing<br>Aston University<br>Talk title: &quot;Early spatial vision: a view through two eyes&quot; [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T18:40:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Harriet Allen</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2aa684fa.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;bdd7dc00.1503">   <title>REMINDER: Call for 4 Ordinary Committee Member candidates for election to the Executive Committee of the AVA </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;bdd7dc00.1503</link>   <description> Dear AVA Member,<br><br>REMINDER: Call for 4 Ordinary Committee Member candidates for election to the Executive Committee of the AVA, 2015-16<br><br>The AVA is a UK-based charity that aims to advance, promote, develop and improve the study and knowledge of vision sciences. It does this primarily through organizing regular scientific meetings (usually 3 per year) and making various financial awards (including travel bursaries) to young vision scientists. Every two years it also awards the Marr Medal to an outstanding early-career scientist within 10 years of completing their PhD who has a proven track record of high-quality independent research. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T15:31:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Secretariat of The AVA</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;bdd7dc00.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2d4ccc1d.1503">   <title>Annual General Meeting Agenda & Resolution form </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2d4ccc1d.1503</link>   <description> Dear AVA member,<br><br>The Annual General Meeting of the AVA for 2015 will be held in the School of Psychology, University of Nottingham on Friday 24th April, as part of the Annual Meeting. The agenda is attached.<br><br>This message is also to remind you that any of the members can propose a resolution, for consideration at the AGM, if you wish to do so, and a resolution form is attached. Please return the completed form to the Secretariat before the meeting. The address is secretary@theava.net or by post: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T10:01:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Secretariat of The AVA</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2d4ccc1d.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;9c29bf55.1503">   <title>REMINDER: Call for candidates for election to the Executive Committee of the AVA, 2015-16 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;9c29bf55.1503</link>   <description> Dear AVA Member,<br><br>The AVA is a UK-based charity that aims to advance, promote, develop and improve the study and knowledge of vision sciences. It does this primarily through organizing regular scientific meetings (usually 3 per year) and making various financial awards (including travel bursaries) to young vision scientists. Every two years it also awards the Marr Medal to an outstanding early-career scientist within 10 years of completing their PhD who has a proven track record of high-quality independent research. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T09:58:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Secretariat of The AVA</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;9c29bf55.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;480b199f.1503">   <title>Extended deadline ends on March 8th (23:59 CET) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;480b199f.1503</link>   <description> Please accept our apologies if you have received multiple copies of this<br>call!<br><br>*_European Conference on Eye Movements 2015 (ECEM)_*<br>*<br>Extended deadline ends on March 8th (23:59 CET)<br>**For further information and for the submission of your abstracts<br>please visit the conference website: http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at<br>&lt;http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at&gt; *<br><br>We are very pleased to announce this call for the 18th European<br>Conference on Eye Movements (ECEM). As in previous years, we look<br>forward to an exciting conference. As the largest conference on eye<br>movements worldwide, ECEM aims to promote cooperation and communication<br>between researchers and research fields, as well as to exchange<br> [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T10:44:40+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Florian Goller</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;480b199f.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;80e89a5a.1503">   <title>ECEM 2015 - Deadline extended (March 8th, 23:59 CET) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;80e89a5a.1503</link>   <description> Please accept our apologies if you have received multiple copies of this<br>call!<br><br>*_European Conference on Eye Movements 2015 (ECEM)_*<br>*<br>Submission Deadline extended - new deadline is March 8th (23:59 CET)<br>**Due to multiple requests the submission deadline has been extended!<br>For further information and for the submission of your abstracts please<br>visit the conference website: http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at<br>&lt;http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at&gt; * [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-01T16:12:23+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Florian Goller</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;80e89a5a.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;7f3241ce.1502">   <title>AVA Easter AGM Reminder </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;7f3241ce.1502</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Abstracts are coming in now for the *AVA 2015 Annual Meeting at<br>Nottingham* on Friday 24th April.<br><br>This year\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds invited speakers will be:<br><br>*Mark Georgeson<br>&quot;Early spatial vision: a view through two eyes&quot;<br>* Centre for Research in Vision and Hearing<br>Aston University<br><br>*Innes Cuthill<br>&quot;Matching the background: deceptively simple?&quot;<br>* Behavioural and Sensory Ecology<br>University of Bristol<br><br>*Jan Atkinson*<br>Visual Development Unit, UCL [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T10:04:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Harriet Allen</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;7f3241ce.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;ec2e3ff9.1502">   <title>ECEM 2015 - Reminder - Deadline for submissions is on March 1st </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;ec2e3ff9.1502</link>   <description> Please accept our apologies if you have received multiple copies of this<br>call!<br><br>*_European Conference on Eye Movements 2015 (ECEM)_*<br><br>*Reminder - Deadline for submissions is on March 1st (**23:59 CET)<br>**For further information and for the submission of your abstracts<br>please visit the conference website: http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at<br>&lt;http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at&gt; *<br><br>We are very pleased to announce this call for the 18th European<br>Conference on Eye Movements (ECEM). As in previous years, we look<br>forward to an exciting conference. As the largest conference on eye<br>movements worldwide, ECEM aims to promote cooperation and communication<br>between researchers and research fields, as well as [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T10:51:07+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Florian Goller</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;ec2e3ff9.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;a406e57.1502">   <title>[Workshop][UK] Binocular Vision Workshop </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;a406e57.1502</link>   <description> ViiHM Binocular Vision Mini-Workshop<br><br>Binocular Vision: Challenges and Techniques<br><br>Tues 31st March - Wed 1st April, 2015,<br>Wivenhoe House Hotel, Colchester, UK<br><br>This meeting will bring together researchers from both biological and machine vision backgrounds to establish common grounds for collaborative research in binocular vision, and determine research questions where each field is best able to provide a unique contribution. The meeting will contain a mixture of seminar talks, and networking and discussion sessions. Advances in both research areas will be covered, along with techniques, methodologies and research resources. The meeting aims to help develop a common understanding of the [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T09:36:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrew Schofield (Psychology)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;a406e57.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cdb3fe68.1502">   <title>Meeting: AVA Animal Vision / CamoCon 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cdb3fe68.1502</link>   <description> The AVA Animal Vision Meeting / CamoCon 2015 will take place in Liverpool,<br>UK, on Sunday 23 August as a satellite meeting of ECVP 2015 &lt;<br>http://www.ecvp.org/2015/&gt;.<br><br>The meeting\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds theme is the interaction between animal vision and<br>coloration, in particular defensive colouration.<br><br>Our keynote speaker is Sami Merilaita (\ufffd\ufffdbo Akademi University, Turku,<br>Finland) &lt; www.abo.fi/public/en/Content/Document/document/17885 &gt;, who will<br>talk on &quot;Background matching&quot;. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T08:07:10+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>N E Scott-Samuel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cdb3fe68.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;38e695dc.1502">   <title>ECVP 2015 Opening Event </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;38e695dc.1502</link>   <description> [Please accept our apologies if you receive multiple copies]<br><br>ECVP 2015 Opening Event<br><br>The 38th European Conference on Visual Perception (ECVP) will take place in Liverpool from August 22nd to August 27th 2015.<br><br>Opening Event on Saturday August 22nd<br><br>We are very pleased to announce an additional event open to everybody coming to ECVP and its satellite meetings.<br>This event will take place on Saturday August 22nd from 3pm at the Everyman Theatre.<br>http://www.everymanplayhouse.com [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-24T16:20:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Marco Bertamini</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;38e695dc.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;a9ccf761.1502">   <title>Meeting announcement - International Pupil Colloquium, Oxford, UK. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;a9ccf761.1502</link>   <description> Upcoming meeting that may of interest:    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-23T11:00:43+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nick Scott-Samuel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;a9ccf761.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;40c37530.1502">   <title>ECEM 2015 -SMI programming competition deadline for is in 10 days! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;40c37530.1502</link>   <description> Please accept our apologies if you have received multiple copies of this<br>call!*<br><br>European Conference on Eye Movements 2015*<br>*SMI Programming Competition*<br><br>*Reminder: Deadline for contributions is in 10 days!*<br><br>SensoMotoric Instruments (SMI) and the European Conference on Eye<br>Movements (ECEM) are delighted to call for contributions to ECEM\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds 2015<br>(Vienna) eye-tracking programming competition. The call is open for<br>newly developed eye-tracking software, and software covering<br>eye-movement research, and/or eye tracking data analysis. The possible<br>applications may cover a variety of fields, such as human computer<br>interaction, event detection algorithms, visualisation and analysis of<br>eye movements, or even entirely novel [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-20T11:31:55+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Florian Goller</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;40c37530.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;9f97d6c1.1502">   <title>Proposed motion : Committee member expences </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;9f97d6c1.1502</link>   <description> Dear AVA members<br><br>The executive committee of the AVA is considering the motion below for consideration by at the AGM and would welcome any comments in advance of the AGM so that the wording can be revised if necessary.<br><br>The essence of this motion is that we would like the freedom to pay expenses to allow each committee member to attend one AVA scientific meeting per year. Currently committee member receive expense for attendance at committee meetings only but some members of the committee are obliged to do their best to attend the AGM in order to give reports. In [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-20T10:05:10+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrew Schofield (Psychology)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;9f97d6c1.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2c54076c.1502">   <title>ECEM 2015 - Reminder - Deadline for submissions is in 10 days! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2c54076c.1502</link>   <description> Please accept our apologies if you have received multiple copies of this<br>call!<br><br>*_European Conference on Eye Movements 2015 (ECEM)_*<br><br>*Reminder - Deadline for submissions is in 10 days!<br>**For further information and for the submission of your abstracts<br>please visit the conference website: http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at<br>&lt;http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at&gt; *<br><br>We are very pleased to announce this call for the 18th European<br>Conference on Eye Movements (ECEM). As in previous years, we look<br>forward to an exciting conference. As the largest conference on eye<br>movements worldwide, ECEM aims to promote cooperation and communication<br>between researchers and research fields, as well as to exchange<br> [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-20T10:35:38+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Florian Goller</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;2c54076c.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cdd9d7a0.1502">   <title>Call for candidates for election to the Executive Committee of the AVA, 2015-16 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cdd9d7a0.1502</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cdd9d7a0.1502">Call for candidates for election to the Executive Committee of the AVA, 2015-16 </a></description>   <dc:date>2015-02-19T16:28:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Secretariat of The AVA</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cdd9d7a0.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;65aa7ab2.1502">   <title>Troscianko Travel Award </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;65aa7ab2.1502</link>   <description> Dear adventurous travellers to ECVP \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Once again, the AVA and ECVP will be collaborating to offer the Tom Troscianko award to adventurous young scientists attending ECVP. The award will be for up to \ufffd\ufffd2,000, and in addition to travel and registration costs (etc) for ECVP, it should include an additional visit to (at least) one other location for scientific purpose - with an emphasis on adventure. Further details and an application form can be found at the links below. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-18T15:09:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meese, Timothy S</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;65aa7ab2.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;b9b1df70.1502">   <title>Workshop: Introduction to Psychopy (August 23rd) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;b9b1df70.1502</link>   <description> Workshop on Sunday August 23rd<br><br>Introduction to Psychopy (1pm - 5pm)<br><br>This workshop will take place in Liverpool on the afternoon before the opening keynote of the European Conference on Visual Perception (ECVP 2015) in the same venue as the conference.<br>www.ecvp.org/2015/<br><br>The workshop runs in parallel to the Satellite meetings so be aware that you will not be able to attend both the workshop and the Satellite meetings (VSAC and AVA). [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-08T14:21:31+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bertamini, Marco</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;b9b1df70.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cd8b470b.1501">   <title>BIS mapping event </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cd8b470b.1501</link>   <description> Dear members<br><br>Many of you may have already received an email from UK Gov about their crowd sourced tool to map out the UK research landscape.<br>The AVA would like to encourage all its members to submit entries to reinforce the importance of research areas relevant to our membership.<br><br>Please take 5 mins to ensure that we, as a community, are well represented in this exercise. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-26T09:43:16+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrew Schofield (Psychology)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;cd8b470b.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;637304a7.1501">   <title>Ian Holliday inaugural lecture </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;637304a7.1501</link>   <description> Hello all,<br><br>A few items of interest:<br><br>1.<br>The AVA is thinking of putting a record of members' successful grant applications on the AVA website. The reasons for this are threefold: (i) the committee feels that we should be celebrating our members' successes; (ii) for those seeking funding, it might be useful to see where the money has been going, and for what; (iii) if grant holders are willing, they might have useful advice for those applying for money. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-23T08:54:25+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nick Scott-Samuel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;637304a7.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;6506ec6.1501">   <title>The AVA Bradshaw-Eagle Undergraduate Research Scholarship </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;6506ec6.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The AVA Bradshaw-Eagle Undergraduate Research Scholarship<br><br>The aim of this scheme is to support undergraduates who wish to carry out supervised summer research projects during the middle years of their degree in a vision laboratory, normally in a UK Higher Education Institution. The Scholarship will provide a stipend (\ufffd\ufffd200 per week, subsistence, for up to 8 weeks) to support undergraduates to carry out a self-contained vision-related research project, in the laboratory of an AVA member. The purpose of the scheme is to allow the student to experience a real research environment and to be trained to carry out [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T09:58:40+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Secretariat of The AVA</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;6506ec6.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;8694cd61.1501">   <title>ECEM 2015 - Deadline for symposia is in 3 days! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AVA;8694cd61.1501</link>   <description> Please accept our apologies if you have received multiple copies of this<br>call!<br><br>*_European Conference on Eye Movements 2015 (ECEM)_*<br><br>*Deadline for symposia is in 3 days on January 25th!<br>**For further information and for the submission of your<br>abstracts/symposia please visit the conference website:<br>http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at &lt;http://ecem2015.univie.ac.at&gt; *<br><br>We are very pleased to announce this call for the 18th European<br>Conference on Eye Movements (ECEM). The call is open for<br>newly developed eye-tracking software, and software covering<br>eye-movement research, and/or eye tracking data analysis. The possible<br>applications may cover a variety of fields, such as human computer<br>interaction, event detection algorithms, visualisation and analysis of<br>eye movements, or even entirely novel applications.
